modName: My Little Pony Main Menu with Theme Music
summary: Changes main menu song and background
descriptionHtml:
My first mod ever.. I owe the credit for how to do all this to ShiggleBiggleBah who, unfortunately, is banned now..

Yes I\'m a brony. Just.. Try to keep your negative comments to yourself.

I do not own the audio file used within the mod. It belongs to Hasbro.
author: taylormathes
